sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose it is given that
\begin{multline}\notag
	\\ (a - 2b - 3c + 4d )(a + 2b + 3c + 4d ) = \\
	(a + 2b - 3c - 4d )(a - 2 b + 3c - 4d )
\end{multline}
Show that
\[
	2ad = 3 bc 
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "It is given that 
\begin{multline}\notag
	\\ (a - 2b - 3c + 4d )(a + 2b + 3c + 4d ) = \\
	(a + 2b - 3c - 4d )(a - 2 b + 3c - 4d )
\end{multline}

\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{a + 2b + 3c + 4d }{a + 2b - 3c - 4d } = \frac{a - 2 b + 3c - 4d }{a - 2b - 3c + 4d }
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Now, by using componendo and dividendo, we can write the above expression as
\begin{multline}\notag
	\\ \frac{(a + 2b + 3c + 4d ) + (a + 2b - 3c - 4d )}{(a + 2b + 3c + 4d ) - (a + 2b - 3c - 4d )} = \\
	\frac{(a - 2 b + 3c - 4d ) + (a - 2b - 3c + 4d )}{(a - 2 b + 3c - 4d ) - (a - 2b - 3c + 4d )}
\end{multline}"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{2 a + 4 b }{6 c + 8 d } = \frac{2a - 4b }{6 c - 8 d }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{a + 2b }{3 c + 4 d } = \frac{a - 2b }{3c - 4d }
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{a + 2b }{a - 2b } = \frac{3c + 4d }{3c - 4d }
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Now, by using componendo and dividendo, we get
\[
	\frac{a }{2b } = \frac{3c }{4d }
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Now, we got
\[
	\Rightarrow 4ad = 6bc 
\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow 2ad = 3bc 
\]
Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Upon dividing}$$ \begin{multline}\notag
	\\ (a - 2b - 3c + 4d )(a + 2b + 3c + 4d ) = \\
	(a + 2b - 3c - 4d )(a - 2 b + 3c - 4d )
\end{multline} $$\text{by $(a - 2b - 3c + 4d )(a + 2b - 3c - 4d )$, we get $\frac{a + 2b + 3c + 4d }{a + 2b - 3c - 4d } = \frac{a - 2 b + 3c - 4d }{a - 2b - 3c + 4d }$}$$
 "}, {"data": [], "text": "Applying componendo and dividendo on the previous equation, we get \begin{multline}\notag
	\\ \frac{(a + 2b + 3c + 4d ) + (a + 2b - 3c - 4d )}{(a + 2b + 3c + 4d ) - (a + 2b - 3c - 4d )} = \\
	\frac{(a - 2 b + 3c - 4d ) + (a - 2b - 3c + 4d )}{(a - 2 b + 3c - 4d ) - (a - 2b - 3c + 4d )}
\end{multline} "}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Upon simplification of the equation we get $\frac{a + 2b }{3 c + 4 d } = \frac{a - 2b }{3c - 4d }$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Multiplying both sides by $\frac{3 c + 4 d}{a - 2 b }$ we get $\frac{a + 2b }{a - 2b } = \frac{3c + 4d }{3c - 4d }$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Componendo and dividendo on the previous equation will give us $\frac{a }{2b } = \frac{3c }{4d }$}$$ "}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Cross multiplication will give us $4ad = 6bc $}$$ "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
